title: WCAS SPANISH 261-0-20 Literature in Latin America since 1888
class_attributes:
Literature & Fine Arts Distro Area

Prerequisites apply, see description

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Survey of the modern period, including modernismo, the historical avant-garde, the "Boom," and recent literary trends. Authors such as Delmira Agustini, Jorge Luis Borges, Julio Cortázar, Rubén Darío, Gabriel García Márquez, José Martí, Pablo Neruda, Cristina Peri Rossi, and Elena Poniatowska.

subject: SPANISH
